list.title: LinePlotter
list.subtitle: App to plot lines of the form  y = mx + b
list: Made using React, Redux, React charts, Glamorous, Glamor and React-slingshot
Contains a main Reducer which makes use of the smaller reducers

list.title: Tic Tac Toe
list.subtitle: Tic Tac Toe for two people
list: Made with Vue and vanilla JavaScript basics
Built to show how to use the basics of Vue.js
Wrote an accompanying article on my medium publication describing how to use Vue.js
